I do not know if the Chrysknife can be looted in Paw, however it is a RARE
drop of the Gnoll Embalmer from Lake Rathe. His common drop is, of course,
the Skul of Jhen'Tra, but I looted a chrysknife from him a couple of weeks
ago. Of course, I've probably killed him 3 dozen times, and that's the only
knife I've ever seen. I was quite surprised. :-)

-----Original Message-----
From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal [mailto:birdman@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 23, 1999 10:07 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Crysknife (OT)


From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal <birdman@...>

A friend of mine has his heart set on getting one of these, and I can't
for the life of me (literally, on occasion) find where in Paw it comes
from. If anyone has good, specific information on it, please email me
directly to keep offtopic discussion (mostly) off the list.

TIA,
Athren Notechaser, chaining up a storm
